hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Stone of Agony# and #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Having trouble breathing underwater?^Have you tried wearing more BLUE?

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.
